required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Hemodynamic Effects of CGRP After Glibenclamide Administration in Healthy Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: The Hemodynamic Effects of CGRP After Glibenclamide Administration in a Randomized Double-blind Cross-over Placebo-controlled Study With Healthy Volunteers

brief_summary.textblock: To investigate the hemodynamic effects of CGRP after glibenclamide administration.

detailed_description.textblock:
20 healthy participants will randomly be allocated to receive CGRP infusion followed by glibenclamide or placebo on two different days.
The aim of the study is to investigate the vascular effect of CGRP after glibenclamide administration.
Repeated measurements covering the arteria radialis (RA), superficiel temporal artery (STA) and middle cerebral artery (MCA) before and after glibenclamide/placebo administration and CGRP infusion.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Randomized, double-blind, cross-over, placebo-controlled design in healthy volunteers.
study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Changes in the arterial radialis (RA), superficiel temporal artery (STA) and middle cerebral artery (MCA)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Time of measurements is baseline and repeatedly every 20 min for 240 min.
primary_outcome.description: Repeated measurements covering the diameter of RA , STA and MCA before and after glibenclamide/placebo administration and CGRP infusion measured by centimeter (cm)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Time of headache measurements is from before (-20 min) and after (12 hours) glibenclamide/placebo administration.
secondary_outcome.description: Headache intensity will be recorded by numerical rating scale (NRS) from 0 to 10 (0, no headache; 1, a feeling of pressure; 10, worst imaginable headache).

arm_group.description: Participants will recieve CGRP infusion after glibenclamide/placebo administration
Participants will recieve CGRP infusion after glibenclamide/placebo administration

intervention.description: Oral administration of glibenclamide or placebo. To investigate the role of CGRP on cranial arteries in healthy volunteers after glibenclamide/placebo administration .

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy volunteers of both sexes.
- 18-60 years.
- 50-100 kg.
- Women of childbearing potential must use adequate contraception
Exclusion Criteria:
- A history of serious somatic disease
- Migraine or any other type of headache (except episodic tension-type headache less than once a month)
- Daily intake of any medication except contraceptives
